Name: Blood Beast
Effect: Acolytes on this space immediately die.

Name: Bountiful Beast
Effect: When Reaping this space, gain Gold and Card Loot from adjacent spaces.
Clarifications: Do not gain the effects of Envrionment tiles, or Traits.

Name: Calamity Beast
Effect: When entering a space, Acolytes and Colossi there must move to adjacent spaces. Resolve in order, beginning with the player with Mantle.
Clarifications: Resolve the movement of each Acolyte and Colossus individually, beginning with the player with Mantle. If the Calamity Beast moves two spaces in a row, resolve the Acolyte and Colossus movements from the first space before the Calamity Beast moves to the second space.

Name: Golden Beast
Effect: When entering a space, place 2 Gold Cubes there.

Name: Magnetic Beast
Effect: When moving, take all Gold cubes from this space with it.

Name: Stone Beast
Effect: Acolytes on this space cannot be killed or moved.

Name: Wind Beast
Effect: When leaving a space, all Acolytes on its space move with it.
